name: MUGS!
description:
MUGS! is a short but fun platformer game in which you teleport to a mug that you throw. Made for the 2022 Cozy Fall jam.

An update with SFX will be coming soon, because I didn't have enough time to add them during the jam. Also, in the first downloadable, you can't finish the game, so just download v.1.2.

KNOWN BUGS: The pause menus' a bit broken and I mean in the sense that It will literally destroy the entire game if you use it. So try not to too much :D. Also, the checkbox for the speedrun timer doesn't work, (there is a timer no matter what).  Maybe I'll fix it later though ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
